A story published Saturday said Mitch Daniels would be the odds-on favorite for the GOP nomination in 2012 if pundits, conservative columnists and political thinkers represented the party's base. The diminutive Hoosier has nurtured a profile as a mature politician whose outlook extends beyond the next news cycle and whose demeanor exudes seriousness, the story said. the APC, said that Mike Pence 's ability to unite the three traditional areas of conservatism- fiscal, foreign policy, and social- make him an ideal candidate for the nation's newly energized conservatives.
